1.content: Prepare website code for Hostinger deployment with custom domain FindBrexitConsultants.co.uk
1.details: 1. Update all hardcoded URLs to use the custom domain. 2. Configure environment variables for production. 3. Optimize build settings for Hostinger. 4. Ensure Supabase integration works with the new domain.

2.content: Create comprehensive deployment guide for Hostinger
2.details: 1. Step-by-step Hostinger deployment instructions. 2. Domain configuration guide. 3. SSL certificate setup. 4. Environment variables configuration. 5. Database connection verification steps.

3.content: Package complete website files for upload
3.details: 1. Create production build. 2. Include all necessary static assets. 3. Prepare .htaccess file for proper routing. 4. Package everything for easy upload to Hostinger.

4.content: Run comprehensive test suite on final deployment
4.details: 1. Execute all 42 test cases after deployment. 2. Test on the actual FindBrexitConsultants.co.uk domain. 3. Verify all functionality works correctly. 4. Generate detailed test report.
